txt.en: As you stand before Lhingroth, you hear a wretched chorus of chittering and hissing echoing out from within the mouth of the caverns. It is there in the shadowed depths of Tarlang's Peaks that the spiders of the Blackroot Vale dwell, and it is from that dark lair that they creep forth to trouble the hamlet of Sardol.\n\nYou should defeat spiders in Lhingroth to aid the people of Sardol.
You have defeated a number of foul spiders in Lhingroth.
You have defeated a number of foul spiders in Lhingroth and brought a renewed sense of peace to the hamlet of Sardol.
Spiders can be found in Lhingroth in the Blackroot Vale.\n\nYou have discovered a number of foul spiders inhabiting the caverns of Lhingroth. You should defeat them.
Spiders can be found in Lhingroth in the Blackroot Vale.
Countless spiders dwell in the caverns of Lhingroth and pose a grave threat to the hamlet of Sardol.
